examples.example: 妈妈买了新鲜的菜心，准备晚上做一顿美味的晚餐。

translate.english: Mother bought fresh flowering Chinese cabbage and prepared to make a delicious dinner at night.

examples.example: 我今天亲自下厨，炒了一盘美味的菜心，家人都很喜欢。

translate.english: I cooked by myself today and stir-fried a plate of delicious flowering Chinese cabbage, and my family all liked it very much.

examples.example: 我来到菜市场，精心挑选了一把绿油油的菜心。

translate.english: I came to the food market and carefully selected a bunch of green flowering Chinese cabbage.
